tgt_original: pratidinaṃ catuḥsandhyaṃ samādhitrayayogavān |  bhūtvā sādhaya saṃsiddhiṃ sāmānyetarabhāvanīm ||375 ||
vajreṇādīptavapuṣā sphālayāmi trikāyajān ||161 ||  laṃghayedyadi kaścinme viśīryetātra nānyathā |
ato bodhyarthiko mantrī kāyavākcittaceṣṭitam |  karma kuryādvidhānena sarvaṃ tadbodhaye matam ||379 ||  yathā praviṣṭaśiṣyebhyo'nuśaṃsārthibhya ityapi |
om gha gha ghātaya ghātaya sarvaduṣṭān phaṭ kīlaya kīlaya sarvapāpān phaṭ hū hū hū vajra kīla[ya] vajradhara ājñāpayati kāyavākcittavajra kīlaya hū phaṭ |
kṣmāṃ saṃlipya sugandhādyaiścitraiḥ puṣpaiḥ prakīrya ca |
anukampāmupādāya saśiṣyastuṣyatu mama |  maṇḍale sahitāḥ sarve sānidhyaṃ kartumarhatha ||180 ||
kulino guṇinaḥ śrāddhānrūpavarṇavayo'nvitān ||182 ||  arthinaścābhiyuktāṃśca saugatānmantrasādhane |  virūpānnirguṇāṃścāpi hīnānapyadhivāsayet ||183 ||
caturṇāmapyanujñātaḥ parṣadāṃ maṇḍale vidhiḥ |  śikṣāsu svāsu yuktānāṃ mahāyānaratātmanām ||184 ||  mantrasiddhyarthinaḥ kecit praviśantīha maṇḍale |
amuko'haṃ mahāvajrī mañjuśryudayamaṇḍalam |  likhiṣyāmi jagacchuddhyai yathāśaktyupacārataḥ ||179 ||
evamuktvā tu tān śiṣyān dhiyā sā(svā)  ntarniveśitān |  prāgvadvajrābjasaṃśuddhān gṛhadvāre tu yācayet ||188 ||
dehi me samayaṃ tattvaṃ bodhicittaṃ ca dehi me |
buddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca dehi me śaraṇatrayam ||190 ||
triruccāryaitān śiṣyāñjñātvā yadbhaktivatsalān ||191 ||  prathānaṃ śiṣyamekaṃ tu kṛtvā brūyādidaṃ vacaḥ |
mantraprayogamatulaṃ yena bhagnaṃ mahābalam |  mārasainyaṃ mahāghoraṃ śākyasiṃhādibhirvaraiḥ ||194 ||
mahāvajramayaḥ sattvo mañjuvajrādya siddha me ||282 ||  sarvavajradharo rājā siddha me paramākṣara ||283 ||
tena satyena me nātha kāmāṃstvaṃ paripūraya ||288 ||
mūrdhnināmataḥ |  yadyad bhāti svasarvasvaṃ mukhyaṃ tanmañjurāṭ svayam |
dharmāḥ śuddhāḥ prakṛtyā yad buddhajñānacayaḥ sa hi ||309 ||
svasyaiva cakravartitve śrīdhvanirnāma āditaḥ |  sarve sarvādhipatyā tu vajrānto he niyojitāḥ ||310 ||
tvayāpi hi sadā dhāryaṃ vajrapāṇi dṛḍhavratam ||313 ||
om sarvatathāgatasiddhivajrasamaye tiṣṭha eṣa tvāṃ dhārayāmi hīḥ hi hi hi hi hū |
tattvena siddha me bhagavan mahārāgo mahārata ||284 ||
tvayāpi hi sadā dhāryā bodhiragrā jinairmatā |
ayaṃ vaḥ satataṃ rakṣaḥ(kṣyaḥ)  siddhaḥ samayasaṃvaraḥ |
bodhicittaṃ na vai tyājyaṃ yadvajramiti mudrayā |
saddharmo na pratikṣepyo na ca tyājyaḥ kadācana |
ajñānādvātha mohādvā na vai vivṛṇuyāt sa tu ||386 ||
vajraṃ ghaṇṭā ca mudrā ca na vai tyājyā kadācana |

src_original: དེས་ནི་རྟག་ཏུ་སྡུག་བསྔལ་ཐོབ་༎ རིམས་དང་འོར་དང་དུག་དང་ནད་༎ མཁའ་༄༢༥ཨ་༌་༎ འགྲོས་གཙེས་དང་བཟུང་བ་དང་༎ བགེགས་དང་ཚོགས་བདག་དྲག་པོ་ཡིས་༎ བསད་ནས་དམྱལ་བར་འགྲོ་བར་འགྱུར་༎

tgt_original: nityaṃ ca gurave deyaṃ sarvabuddhasamo hyasau ||393 ||
tasmāt sarvaprayatnena vajrācāryaṃ mahāgurum |  pracchannavarakalyāṇaṃ nāvamanyet kadācana ||391 ||
anurūpaṃ ca te deyaṃ gurubhaktaṃ sadakṣiṇam |
tato jvarādayastāpā na bhūyaḥ prabhavanti hi ||392 ||
adya vaḥ saphalaṃ janma yadasmin supratiṣṭhitāḥ |
adya mārān vinirjitya praviṣṭāḥ paramaṃ puram |
tathā tathā hi sattvārthaṃ kuryādrāgādibhiḥ śuciḥ ||374 ||
